name: Orhygami - GDA Microgame jam 2022
description:
Submission for UCSC GDA 2022 Microgame Jam

Fold origami to the rhythm!

Difficulty Shortcuts:
- shift + enter: increment the difficulty when you win
- shift + (1-3): set the difficulty from 1-3
- to reset to the gamejam difficulty, do shift + enter twice.
- use the command line from inspect to check the current difficulty settings

Team
